Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the actions of Congress party workers by calling them "illiterate uncouth Congressis" and "terrorists."
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence to support the accusation that Congress party workers are vandalizing solar panels.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the individuals seen in the video are affiliated with the Congress party without providing any concrete evidence.
Exist alternative explanation: The video has been shared with different narratives, suggesting that there may be alternative explanations for the vandalism of the solar panels.
